title: r/Askreddit What's Your "I Don't Get Paid Enough For This" Moment?
description: r/Askreddit Have you ever been at a job and thought to yourself, "These jerks aren't paying me enough to deal with this stuff," and considered quitting? The people in today's Askreddit post certainly have! Enjoy these stories of psychotic customers and unreasonable managers who push everyday workers past their breaking point. Screw this, I quit! If you like this content, be sure to subscribe for more daily Reddit content!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
